product_name: The North Face Maddie Raschel Jacket - Women's
long_description: Wind-resistant, breathable and warm, The North Face Maddie Raschel jacket is ready to tackle any activity-it's equally at home on the trail, on campus or around town. It's made from the lightest and most breathable soft-shell fabric from The North Face; generous stretch makes it ideal for high-movement and vigorous activity. Silky, bonded-fleece backer fabric is ultra soft next to skin and holds in warmth; fleece fabric peaks out from the hood's edges. Durable water repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. The North Face Maddie Raschel jacket has 2 zip hand pockets and a stretchy hem band.
short_description: Wind-resistant, breathable and warm, The North Face Maddie Raschel jacket is ready to tackle any activity-it's equally at home on the trail, on campus or around town.
